  • Uses of FactionEnum in factors

    Methods in factors that return FactionEnum
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    FactionEnum Faction.getFactionName()
    getFactionName method returns faction name(full form), this method is overloaded with #getFaction(ArmyBuild winnersArmy)
    Methods in factors with parameters of type FactionEnum
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void Composition.chooseRandomComposition​(FactionEnum faction, Commander leader, boolean scenario, ArmiesEnum allegienceToArmy)
    chooseRandomComposition method sets composition to random values, not entirely random though, there is guarantee that faction bonus and leaders specialization(if it's higher than average) put some base regiments into composition
    void Composition.createArmy​(FactionEnum faction, Commander leader, boolean scenario, ArmiesEnum allegienceToArmy)

    getRandomFactionBonus method returns array containing information important for random composition method
    void Faction.setFactionName​(FactionEnum newFactionName)
